attributes.action: Overturn BCP Councils unreasonable demands and let Bournemouth airshow proceed
attributes.additional_details:
The Bournemouth airshow is a major attraction and brings thousands of tourists to the area which generates huge revenues for local businesses.  
The organisers of the Bournemouth Airshow have everything organised including health and safety issues but the council continue to make unreasonable demands and ignore their citizens wishes
attributes.background: We want the Government to step in and insist that BCP take into account its citizens wishes to assist the Bournemouth Airshow to proceed in 2026.
